segments.text: Oh dear, that water is just going everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Poor woman, she's going to have a big mess to clean up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those poor kids, they could really get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel so bad for them, they don't even realize the danger they're in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool is so wobbly, it's just a matter of time before it tips over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman notices before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out, and she's just standing there, oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like she's in a trance, completely unaware of her surroundings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could help, but I'm just an observer here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think this is a moment that could have been avoided with a little more attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a shame, really, the whole situation.
segments.speaker: PAR
